intro: THIS GAME REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION TO PLAY. PLEASE TRY OUT THE FREE DEMO BEFORE PURCHASE.
description:
Resident Evil 7 biohazard Cloud includes the main game, all of the extra content, and six Survival Pack variants. Experience the entire Baker Mansion incident.

Fear Comes Home

This pack includes the following content:
- Resident Evil 7 biohazard Cloud
- Banned Footage Vol.1
- Banned Footage Vol.2
- Not a Hero
- End of Zoe
- 5 Coin set
- 6 Survival Pack Variations (Supply Boxes x 6, Coins x 5, Madhouse Difficulty)
